name: Christopher HESS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (Jeffrey Beard), and Verizon of Pennsylvania, and T-Netix Services, Inc., and T-Netix Telecommunications Services, Inc., Appellees
name_abbreviation: Hess v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Christopher HESS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (Jeffrey Beard), and Verizon of Pennsylvania, and T-Netix Services, Inc., and T-Netix Telecommunications Services, Inc., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of February, 2009, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

966 A.2d 550
Christopher HESS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (Jeffrey Beard), and Verizon of Pennsylvania, and T-Netix Services, Inc., and T-Netix Telecommunications Services, Inc., Appellees.
